__e: I'd rather be miserable with you than without you.
Sick of this house, sick of my unhappy life with you.
Marrying the wrong man and miserable with someone I don't love.
So you saw that I was unhappy and did what you concluded would make me feel better?
But go... go now and take care of your friend
I've just had an unhappy love affair, so I don't see why anybody else should have a good time.
